kpi.name: M1010C204

kpi_info.title: ISHO CANCEL DUE TO CPICH RSCP FOR RT
kpi_info.use: The number of inter-system HHO measurements cancelled due to CPICH RSCP for UEs with RT connection. UPDATED: When the RNC receives such a CPICH RSCP measurement report from the UE that triggers the cancellation of inter-system HHO measurement.

kpi.kpi_alias: ISHO CANCEL DUE TO CPICH RSCP FOR RT
